publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/03/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To cash lent to pay for Hat 18/
To absence from Noon of date
To two Buss Corn in my absence 6
By twenty six Days work at 7/6
To rent of House &c. to April 1st
To paying W. Kelley upon order

Jess New
D debtor To cash 7 88
